verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> And it came to pass in the month נִיסָ֗ן <S%H5212><s%> Nisan שְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> year עֶשְׂרִ֛ים <S%H6242><s%> in the twentieth לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֥סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> of Artaxerxes הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> [that] wine לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> [was] before וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> him and I took up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> the wine וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> and gave לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [it] unto the king וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> been רַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> Now I had not been [beforetime] sad לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> in his presence

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said לִ֨י הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Wherefore the king מַדּ֣וּעַ ׀ <S%H4069><s%> Why פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> unto me Why [is] thy countenance רָעִ֗ים <S%H7451><s%> sad וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you אֵֽינְךָ֣ <S%H369><s%> is nothing חוֹלֶ֔ה <S%H2470><s%> seeing thou [art] not sick אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is nothing זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> he כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֖ם <S%H518><s%> but רֹ֣עַֽ <S%H7455><s%> ? this [is] nothing [else] but sorrow לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> of heart וָאִירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> afraid הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> sore מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> Then I was very

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> And said לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Let the king לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever יִחְיֶ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> live מַדּ֜וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵרְע֣וּ <S%H7489><s%> not be sad פָנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> why should not my countenance אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> when הָעִ֜יר <S%H5892><s%> when the city בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> the place קִבְר֤וֹת <S%H6913><s%> sepulchres אֲבֹתַי֙ <S%H1><s%> of my fathers' חֲרֵבָ֔ה <S%H2717><s%> decay וּשְׁעָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H8179><s%> and the gates אֻכְּל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> thereof are consumed בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> burning ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לִי֙ הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> he אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <S%H1245><s%> unto me For what dost thou make request וָֽאֶתְפַּלֵּ֔ל <S%H6419><s%> ? So I prayed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> to the God הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> And I said לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king ט֔וֹב <S%H2895><s%> If it please וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if יִיטַ֥ב <S%H3190><s%> have found favour עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> and if thy servant לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> in thy sight אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> you תִּשְׁלָחֵ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> that thou wouldest send אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> me unto Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> unto the city קִבְר֥וֹת <S%H6913><s%> sepulchres אֲבֹתַ֖י <S%H1><s%> of my fathers' וְאֶבְנֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H1129><s%> that I may build

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said לִ֨י הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וְהַשֵּׁגַ֣ל ׀ <S%H7694><s%> unto me (the queen יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> also sitting אֶצְל֗וֹ <S%H681><s%> beside עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֛י <S%H4970><s%> How יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become מַֽהֲלָכֲךָ֖ <S%H4109><s%> will your journey וּמָתַ֣י <S%H4970><s%> be and when תָּשׁ֑וּב <S%H7725><s%> be? and when wilt thou return וַיִּיטַ֤ב <S%H3190><s%> be accepted לִפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> accept הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֔נִי <S%H7971><s%> to send וָֽאֶתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> me and I set ל֖וֹ זְמָֽן׃ <S%H2165><s%> him a time

וָאוֹמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Moreover I said לַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king ט֔וֹב <S%H2895><s%> If it please אִגְּרוֹת֙ <S%H107><s%> let letters יִתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> be given לִ֔י עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> for פַּחֲו֖וֹת <S%H6346><s%> me to the governors עֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> beyond הַנָּהָ֑ר <S%H5104><s%> the river אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> they יַעֲבִיר֔וּנִי <S%H5674><s%> that they may convey me over עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I אָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> till I come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> into Judah

וְאִגֶּ֡רֶת <S%H107><s%> And a letter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָסָף֩ <S%H623><s%> unto Asaph שֹׁמֵ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> the keeper הַפַּרְדֵּ֜ס <S%H6508><s%> forest אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to which יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> that he may give לִ֣י עֵצִ֡ים <S%H6086><s%> me timber לְ֠קָרוֹת <S%H7136><s%> to make beams אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁעֲרֵ֨י <S%H8179><s%> for the gates הַבִּירָ֤ה <S%H1002><s%> of the palace אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which לַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> which [appertained] to the house וּלְחוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> and for the wall הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְלַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> and for the house אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> that I shall enter into אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> granted לִ֣י הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king כְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> of my God הַטּוֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> me according to the good עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וָֽאָב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> Then I came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּֽחֲווֹת֙ <S%H6346><s%> to the governors עֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> beyond הַנָּהָ֔ר <S%H5104><s%> the river וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> and gave לָהֶ֔ם אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אִגְּר֣וֹת <S%H107><s%> letters הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> them the king's וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> had sent עִמִּי֙ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Now the king שָׂ֥רֵי <S%H8269><s%> captains חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> of the army וּפָרָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen פ

וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> heard סַנְבַלַּ֣ט <S%H5571><s%> When Sanballat הַחֹרֹנִ֗י <S%H2772><s%> the Horonite וְטֽוֹבִיָּה֙ <S%H2900><s%> and Tobiah הָעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant הָֽעַמֹּנִ֔י <S%H5984><s%> the Ammonite וַיֵּ֥רַע <S%H7489><s%> displeasing לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> adversity גְדֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> aloud אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> that there was come אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> a man לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek טוֹבָ֖ה <S%H2896><s%> the welfare לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וָאָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> So I came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וָאֱהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> was there יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> days שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> and was there three

וָאָק֣וּם ׀ <S%H6965><s%> And I arose לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in the night אֲנִי֮ <S%H589><s%> I וַאֲנָשִׁ֣ים ׀ <S%H376><s%> men מְעַט֮ <S%H4592><s%> I and some עִמִּי֒ <S%H5973><s%> with וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגַּ֣דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> with me neither told לְאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> I [any] man מָ֗ה <S%H4100><s%> what אֱלֹהַי֙ <S%H430><s%> what my God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> had put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into לִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> in my heart לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem וּבְהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> neither [was there any] beast אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> with כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> with me save the beast אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I רֹכֵ֥ב <S%H7392><s%> that I rode upon בָּֽהּ׃

וָאֵצְאָ֨ה <S%H3318><s%> And I went out בְשַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> by the gate הַגַּ֜יא <S%H1516><s%> of the valley לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in פְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> even before עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> affliction הַתַּנִּ֔ין <S%H8577><s%> the dragon וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שַׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> port הָאַשְׁפֹּ֑ת <S%H830><s%> and to the dung וָאֱהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become שֹׂבֵ֜ר <S%H7663><s%> inspecting בְּחוֹמֹ֤ת <S%H2346><s%> the walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which [הַמְפֹרוָצִים כ] (הֵ֣ם ק) (פְּרוּצִ֔ים <S%H6555><s%> abroad ק) וּשְׁעָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H8179><s%> and the gates אֻכְּל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> thereof were consumed בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire

וָאֶֽעֱבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> Then I went on אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> to the gate הָעַ֔יִן <S%H5869><s%> of the fountain וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּרֵכַ֖ת <S%H1295><s%> pool הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and to the king's וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there מָק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> but [there was] no place לַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> for the beast לַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> [that was] under me to pass תַּחְתָּֽי׃ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash

וָאֱהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become עֹלֶ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> Then went I up בַנַּ֙חַל֙ <S%H5158><s%> by the brook לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in the night וָאֱהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become שֹׂבֵ֖ר <S%H7663><s%> and inspected בַּחוֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> the wall וָאָשׁ֗וּב <S%H7725><s%> and turned back וָאָב֛וֹא <S%H935><s%> and entered בְּשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> by the gate הַגַּ֖יְא <S%H1516><s%> of the valley וָאָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> and [so] returned
